price: 125. (Entonces) dirá: «¡Señor!, ¿por qué has hecho que comparezca ciego si (en la vida terrenal) veía?
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرۡتَنِيٓ أَعۡمَىٰ وَقَدۡ كُنتُ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi lima ḥashartanī aʿmā waqad kuntu baṣīran
